sentences.en: A letter sent airmail will get to Europe quickly.
sentences.cn: 寄往欧洲的航空信件会很快到达.

sentences.en: A letter sent by airmail will get to Europe quickly.
sentences.cn: 寄往欧洲的航空邮件马上就会到达.

sentences.en: Affix the blue airmail label and leave the rest to us.
sentences.cn: 贴上蓝色的空邮标签，其余的事情交给我们。

sentences.en: Do you want to airmail it or not?
Goods are generally shipped by airmail.
sentences.cn: 货物一般通过航空运输。

sentences.en: Goods may be sent by surface mail or airmail.
sentences.cn: 货物可通过平寄或空运发送。

sentences.en: I sent the letter by airmail.
I told her to send the letter by airmail.
sentences.cn: 我叫她把那封信寄航空.

sentences.en: I want to send this letter to China by airmail.
sentences.cn: 我想寄封航空信到中国.

sentences.en: Surface mail takes much longer than airmail.
The postage for airmail is 50 cents.
sentences.cn: 一封航空信的邮资是五十美分.

sentences.en: The spiky handwriting on the airmail envelope from London was obviously hers.
sentences.cn: 发自伦敦的航空信封上的尖长字迹分明是她的.

sentences.en: We sent the letter by airmail.
Well, I'll settle for blue - black. I'll also take a dozen airmail envelopes.
sentences.cn: 噢, 那我要蓝黑的. 我还要一打航空信封.

sentences.en: Write "By Airmail" in the top left hand corner.
sentences.cn: 在左上角写上“航空邮递”.

trans.tran_en: letters and packages that are sent somewhere using a plane, or the system of doing this
